ing: 2 large oranges, peeled and cut into chunks
des: "A sweet, citrus, and spicy salsa. Perfect for an outdoor summer party. Would be great paired well with some chicken."
ins: Combine oranges, tomato, onion, apple juice, orange zest, garlic, jalapeno pepper, ginger, and salt in a large bowl; toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes. Stir in cilantro before serving.
